channel.title: Sunkist - Two Page Template

item.title: Sunkist - Two Page Template
item.dc:creator: @RevengePK RevengePK
item.description:
@RevengePK wrote:

[quote=“SilentCJ, post:7, topic:518008”][quote author=RevengePK link=topic=636270.msg4289835#msg4289835 date=1367037262]
Why are you loading jQuery multiple times?
[/quote]
They’re jQuery plugins… like add-ons to the original jQuery library

At OP, design is good but there are quite a few mistakes in the HTML and a few things in the CSS.

In the HTML:

[ul][li]& symbol should be written with utf, like so &[/li]
[li]All text should be contained in either a paragraph, heading, list, or table cell, some of the text you have there is just a direct child of a block level div.[/li]
[li]Use of target="_blank" is deprecated.[/li]
[li]Your footer is outside of the body?[/li]
[li]You’ve used and , why not and /?[/li][/ul]

CSS:

[ul][li]Read http://css-tricks.com/do-we-need-box-shadow-prefixes/[/li]
[li]margin: 0px auto; margin-bottom: 10px; margin-left: 10px; - All in the same selector, make your mind up. Declare them in the first shorthand margin like so - margin: 0px auto 10px 10px;[/li]
[li]Repetitive classes, a lot of your selectors seem to have much of the same attributes, why not apply a single class like .panel and apply that to all the elements that look similar, and then use an additional class to declare the individual attributes, the ‘variables’ so to say.[/li]
[li]Page width is way too wide, if you’re going to have it that wide it must be fluid.[/li][/ul][/quote]

I know they are plugins but he’s loading the minimal jquery needed for every plugin. Loading the latest version if jQuery once [b]should[\b] work just fine.

Read full topic

item.title: Sunkist - Two Page Template
item.dc:creator: @SilentCJ SilentCJ
item.description:
@SilentCJ wrote:

RevengePK:

Why are you loading jQuery multiple times?

They’re jQuery plugins… like add-ons to the original jQuery library

At OP, design is good but there are quite a few mistakes in the HTML and a few things in the CSS.

In the HTML:

[ul][li]& symbol should be written with utf, like so &[/li]
[li]All text should be contained in either a paragraph, heading, list, or table cell, some of the text you have there is just a direct child of a block level div.[/li]
[li]Use of target="_blank" is deprecated.[/li]
[li]Your footer is outside of the body?[/li]
[li]You’ve used and , why not and /?[/li][/ul]

CSS:

[ul][li]Read http://css-tricks.com/do-we-need-box-shadow-prefixes/[/li]
[li]margin: 0px auto; margin-bottom: 10px; margin-left: 10px; - All in the same selector, make your mind up. Declare them in the first shorthand margin like so - margin: 0px auto 10px 10px;[/li]
[li]Repetitive classes, a lot of your selectors seem to have much of the same attributes, why not apply a single class like .panel and apply that to all the elements that look similar, and then use an additional class to declare the individual attributes, the ‘variables’ so to say.[/li]
[li]Page width is way too wide, if you’re going to have it that wide it must be fluid.[/li][/ul]

Read full topic

item.title: Sunkist - Two Page Template
item.dc:creator: @3lv3n_snip3r 3lv3n snip3r
item.description:
@3lv3n_snip3r wrote:

You may only add to the copyright footer, do not alter the current copyright on it.

Images:
Navigation menu when hovering over it:

Navigation menu when not hovering over it:

Codes:
Index.php:

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">

	<head>
		<title>Sunkist - Home</title>
		<link href="css/main.css" type="text/css" rel="stylesheet" />
		<link href="css/navigation.css" type="text/css" rel="stylesheet" />
		<link href="css/news.css" type="text/css" rel="stylesheet" />
		<link href="css/smoothDivScroll.css" type="text/css" rel="stylesheet" />
		<script src="js/jquery.min.1.8.1.js" type="text/javascript"></script>
		<script src="js/jquery-ui-1.8.2.custom.min.js" type="text/javascript"></script>
		<script src="js/jquery.mousewheel.min.js" type="text/javascript"></script>
		<script src="js/jquery.kinetic.js" type="text/javascript"></script>
		<script src="js/jquery.smoothdivscroll-1.3-min.js" type="text/javascript"></script>
		<script type="text/javascript">
			$(document).ready(function () {
				$(".imageSlider").smoothDivScroll({
					mousewheelScrolling: "allDirections",
					manualContinuousScrolling: true,
					autoScrollingMode: "onStart"
				});
			});
		</script>
	</head>

	<body>
		<a href="index.php">
			<div class="imageBanner"></div>
		</a>
		<nav>
			<ul>
				<li><a href="index.php" class="active">Home</a>
				<li><a href="forum/">Forum</a>
				<li><a href="game.php">Play Now</a>
				<li><a href="highscores/">Highscores</a>
				<li><a href="downloads.php">Downloads</a>
				<li><a href="membership.php">Membership</a>
				<div class="navTooltip">
					<div class="tooltipFont">Navigation</div>
				</div>
			</ul>
		</nav>
		<div class="wrapper">
			<div class="sliderBorder">
				<div class="imageSlider">
					<img src="img/slideshow/slide1.png" alt="" />
					<img src="img/slideshow/slide2.png" alt="" />
					<img src="img/slideshow/slide3.png" alt="" />
					<img src="img/slideshow/slide4.png" alt="" />
					<img src="img/slideshow/slide5.png" alt="" />
				</div>
			</div>
			<div class="newsBar">
				<marquee behavior="scroll" direction="left" scrollamount="2">Recent News & Updates:...
			</div>
			<div class="sidebarWrapper">
				<div class="sidebar">
					<div class="contentHeader">
						Recent Updates
					</div>
					<ul class="news">
						<?php
							include("news.php");
							showNews("1");
						?>
					</ul>
				</div>
			</div>
			<div class="innerWrapper">
			<div class="content">
				<div class="contentHeader">
					Main Content Header
				</div>
				<p>
					Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit...
				</p>
				<p>
					Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit...
				</p>
				<p>
					Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit...
				</p>
				<p>
					Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit...
				</p>
			</div>
				<div class="content">
					<div class="contentHeader">
						Sub-Content Header
					</div>
					<div class="boxes">
						<div class="contentHeader">
							Box Header
						</div>
						Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit...
					</div>
					<div class="boxes">
						<div class="contentHeader">
							Box Header
						</div>
						Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit...
					</div>
					<div class="boxes">
						<div class="contentHeader">
							Box Header
						</div>
						Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit...
					</div>
					<div class="centeredText">
						More content coming soon.
					</div>
				</div>
			</div>
		</div>
	</body>

	<footer>
		<div class="footerInner">
			<strong>Design by: <a href="http://www.rspsdesigns.com/" target="_blank">RSPSDesigns</a></strong> <a href="index.html" target="_blank">Your Site</a> © 2099.
		</div>
	</footer>

</html>

Main.css:

* {
	margin: 0;
	padding: 0;
	color: #fff;
	font-family: 'Candara', Arial, sans-serif;
}

* a:hover {
	text-decoration: none;
}

body {
	background: #87FFF9 url('../img/background.jpg') fixed no-repeat center;
}

p {
	margin-bottom: 10px;
}

.imageBanner {
	background: url('../img/logo.png') no-repeat;
	width: 950px;
	height: 150px;
	margin: 0 auto auto auto;
}

.wrapper {
	height: auto;
	width: 1120px;
	margin: 15px auto auto auto;
}

.innerWrapper {
	height: auto;
	margin-left: 255px;
}

.content {
	z-index: 5;
	margin: 0px auto;
	width: 800px;
	height: 100%;
	margin-bottom: 10px;
	padding: 10px;
	background: rgba(0,0,0,0.6);
	border: 1px solid #000;
	margin-left: 10px;
	box-shadow:inset 0px 0px 15px rgba(0,0,0,1);
	-webkit-box-shadow:inset 0px 0px 15px rgba(0,0,0,1);
	-moz-box-shadow:inset 0px 0px 15px rgba(0,0,0,1);
	-ms-box-shadow:inset 0px 0px 15px rgba(0,0,0,1);
}

.centeredText {
	text-align: center;
	margin-bottom: 10px;
}

.largeContent {
	z-index: 5;
	margin: 0px auto;
	width: 1033px;
	height: 100%;
	margin-bottom: 10px;
	padding: 10px;
	background: rgba(0,0,0,0.6);
	border: 1px solid #000;
	margin-left: 32.5px;
	box-shadow:inset 0px 0px 15px rgba(0,0,0,1);
	-webkit-box-shadow:inset 0px 0px 15px rgba(0,0,0,1);
	-moz-box-shadow:inset 0px 0px 15px rgba(0,0,0,1);
	-ms-box-shadow:inset 0px 0px 15px rgba(0,0,0,1);
}

.boxes {
	float: left;
	margin-left: 13px;
	z-index: 5;
	width: 28.35%;
	height: 100%;
	margin-bottom: 10px;
	padding: 10px;
	background: rgba(0,0,0,0.3);
	border: 1px solid #000;
	box-shadow:inset 0px 0px 15px rgba(0,0,0,1);
	-webkit-box-shadow:inset 0px 0px 15px rgba(0,0,0,1);
	-moz-box-shadow:inset 0px 0px 15px rgba(0,0,0,1);
	-ms-box-shadow:inset 0px 0px 15px rgba(0,0,0,1);
}

.contentHeader {
	text-shadow: 0px 0px 10px #fff;
	text-align: center;
	font-size: 125%;

}

.pageTitle {
	width: 1033px;
	text-align: center;
	background: rgba(0,0,0,0.6);
	margin: 0px auto;
	padding: 10px;
	border: 1px solid #000;
	box-shadow:inset 0px 0px 15px rgba(0,0,0,1);
	-webkit-box-shadow:inset 0px 0px 15px rgba(0,0,0,1);
	-moz-box-shadow:inset 0px 0px 15px rgba(0,0,0,1);
	-ms-box-shadow:inset 0px 0px 15px rgba(0,0,0,1);
	font-size: 150%;
	text-shadow: 0px 0px 10px #fff;
	margin-bottom: 10px;
	border-top-right-radius: 25px;
	border-top-left-radius: 25px;
}

.line {
	border: 1px solid #fff;
	box-shadow: 0px 0px 10px #fff;
	width: 100%;
	margin-bottom: 10px;
}

.sidebarWrapper {
	float: left;
	margin-left: 34px;
	width: 240px;
	height: auto;
	margin-top: -31px;
	margin-bottom: 10px;
}

.sidebar {
	height: 100%;
	width: 200px;
	background: rgba(0,0,0,0.6);
	padding: 10px;
	margin-right: 10px;
	margin-top: 31px;
	border: 1px solid #000;
	box-shadow:inset 0px 0px 15px rgba(0,0,0,1);
	-webkit-box-shadow:inset 0px 0px 15px rgba(0,0,0,1);
	-moz-box-shadow:inset 0px 0px 15px rgba(0,0,0,1);
	-ms-box-shadow:inset 0px 0px 15px rgba(0,0,0,1);
}

.newsBar {
	padding: 15px 10px;
	width: 1033px;
	margin-left: 34px;
	margin-bottom: 10px;
	background: rgba(0,0,0,0.6);
	border: 1px solid #000;
	box-shadow:inset 0px 0px 15px rgba(0,0,0,1);
	-webkit-box-shadow:inset 0px 0px 15px rgba(0,0,0,1);
	-moz-box-shadow:inset 0px 0px 15px rgba(0,0,0,1);
	-ms-box-shadow:inset 0px 0px 15px rgba(0,0,0,1);
}

footer {
	clear: both;
	background: rgba(0,0,0,0.6);
	width: 1033px;
	margin: 0px auto;
	padding: 10px;
	border: 1px solid #000;
	box-shadow:inset 0px 0px 15px rgba(0,0,0,1);
	-webkit-box-shadow:inset 0px 0px 15px rgba(0,0,0,1);
	-moz-box-shadow:inset 0px 0px 15px rgba(0,0,0,1);
	-ms-box-shadow:inset 0px 0px 15px rgba(0,0,0,1);
	font-size: 100%;
	margin-bottom: 10px;
	border-bottom-right-radius: 25px;
	border-bottom-left-radius: 25px;
}

.footerInner {
	margin: 0px auto;
	text-align: center;
	font-size: 100%;
}
